contact.contactUsSubtitle: Do you need more information about the Trust1Connector? Do you have a problem with the application? Tell us about it!
contact.Name: Name
contact.t1tAgreement: I agree that Trust1Team may collect and use my personal data provided in this form for sending me Trust1Team news and marketing materials, that I have agreed to receive in accordance with EU & Belgian regulations, including GPDR compliance. You may unsubscribe from this list at any time.
contact.exportMessage: I want to export the data and send it to Trust1Team to help them better understand the problem I am facing

installation.welcome: Welcome to the web application {0} of Trust1Team!
installation.install: To use this application, please install the Trust1Connector software
installation.windows: Here you can download the Windows version of the Trust1Connector, both 64- and 32-bit versions are available
installation.macos: Here you can download the MacOS version of the Trust1Connector, both Intel and Apple silicon versions are available
installation.linux: Here you can download the Linux version of the Trust1Connector, both 64- and 32-bit versions are available
installation.help: When the Trust1Connector is installed you can refresh this page to continue.

modules.File-exchange use: To use the file-exchange module, you must first create an
modules.Entity description: a string value denoting the root entity/owner for types mapping. This can be called the root for all 'aliases' or 'type mappings' which will be created.
modules.Type description: a string value denoting a file typing, related to the absolute path mapped by a user, this value abstracts absolute paths from an application perspective as it acts as an alias, referencing a file or directory based on the configured absolute path.
modules.Supported other modules: Here are the other modules supported by the Trust1Connector:
modules.Card not found: You don't find your card in the list? Please contact us !
